system.description: You are gifted with supernatural abilities to communicate with those around you—for good or in the name of mischief. You learn the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.4gcxix2l4zvy9kdu]{Message} cantrip. At 3rd level, choose either @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.my7wwb844zvxcv4o]{Comprehend Languages} or @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.53sg7r11sfbjj2x1]{Missage}. At 5th level, choose either @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.d22ucrzshn77xlv2]{Babel Tongue} or @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.kbyg7uvh3w8osgiq]{Sending}. These do not count towards the spells you know, and you may cast them once per day without expending any spell slots. Your spellcasting ability modifier for these spells is either Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma, whichever is highest.
